bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Automatic Circuit Reclosers and Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV
IEEE Draft Standard for Automatic Circuit Reclosers and Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.60/D6, Jun 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests, production tests and construction requirements for Overhead, Pad Mounted, Dry Vault, and Submersible Automatic Circuit Reclosers, cutout mounted reclosers and Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems up to 38 kV

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
